item.description: I haven’t been to Japan in a while so a lot of them are recommendations from others that I trust.

item.title: Paris
item.description: Food Mokonuts One of my favorite restuarants in the world. Innovitive, homemade style food cooked with French, Middle Eastern, American and Japanese flavors run by a cool couple.

item.title: Taiwan
item.description: Taipei Food San Jiao Bing Small shop serving shaved ice and transitional dessert soups. This was the best dessert I had in Taiwan.
